creator: Various
description:
LibriVox recording of Victorian Short Stories of Troubled Marriages by Various.
Read in English by Gina Belmonde
A delightful collection of short stories by some of the luminary authors of the Victorian era. These stories explore the truth behind the victorian marriage. - Summary by Gina Belmonde
For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;short stories; marriage; divorce
